Forces the user to re-login, which is necessary for authorizing with multiple accounts from the same instance.
queryParams.name: force_login

queryParams.description: The ISO 639-1 two-letter language code to use while rendering the authorization form.
queryParams.name: lang

queryParams.name: max_id
queryParams.description: Return results older than this ID

queryParams.name: since_id
queryParams.description: Return results newer than this ID

queryParams.name: min_id
queryParams.description: Return results immediately newer than this ID
Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 15 notifications. Max 30 notifications.
queryParams.name: limit
types[]
queryParams.description: Types to include in the result.

queryParams.name: exclude_types[]
queryParams.description: Types to exclude from the results.
